TutorialStep.Instructions:
This example shows how to initialize breeze and create and run a very simple query.
To start with, in the title bar of the box below, you should click "Run".
If at any time during this tutorial you find it unclear how to proceed, or your code isn't behaving as the tutorial describes, you can always click the *"Help, it's not working!"* button (above). This will replace your code with a working copy.
You should have seen a list of employee names appear in the box below.
Now let's try and make the query a bit more complicated by adding an "orderBy" clause.
Simply replace this query
> var query = new entityModel.EntityQuery() > .from("Employees");
with this query
> var query = new entityModel.EntityQuery() > .from("Employees") > .orderBy("LastName");
and then press 'Run'
